name: Game Dashboard
detailed_description:
Practical overlay for gaming professionals. In-game GPU status, clocks and framerate control.

Features

  • Dynamic framerate limiter with in-game adjustments.
  • High-precision timing. Optimal frame stability/smoothness (when applied properly). Minimal resource usage.
  • GPU status information for temperatures, fan speed, resource utilization and memory consumption.
  • Full multi-GPU support.
  • Simple under/overclocking.

Community-Driven Development

New features will be added based on user preferences and will always be free for existing customers. Anyone with useful original suggestions will be entitled to free Steam keys.


If you're an e-sports player with specific gameplay needs or a game developer interested in debugging features feel free to send a message detailing your requirements.

Privacy and Security

This software doesn't require drivers or administrative privileges to work, and it doesn't write any data to the file system or Windows registry. It doesn't access the internet and can be used with Steam in offline mode (this will remain until DRM abuse appears).


It is adequate for use in secure environments and complies with all data protection regulations, including HIPAA, COPPA and the European GDPR.

Current Limitations

  • GUI is not available for OpenGL games (framerate limiting features still work).
  • GPU status and overclocking features only available for AMD and NVIDIA cards.
  • Windows Store apps not supported.

short_description: Practical overlay for gaming professionals. In-game GPU status, clocks and framerate control.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Any x86 compatible CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan, OpenGL, or DirectX 9 / 10 / 11 / 12 game(s)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual-core or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA graphics card
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan driver 1.1 or higher
